title: Did a Valedictorian Drop Out Just Before Graduating to Become a CEO?
subtitle: Gio Managadze wrote a viral Facebook post claiming he was valedictorian at the University of Maryland, but dropped out just before graduating to pursue his dreams.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Gio Managadze dropped out of the University of Maryland just before graduating as valedictorian to become a CEO.
